Consider whether you should pile all of this tile logic: into one tile, via mixin or via extension
Spin this very 10 seconds just because you can ;P

General thoughts:
- use local storage for saved data (that way it's easier to make this a web app or an electron app)

- Use vuex for shared state

- The tile component is going to be used in numerous spots for different tasks, make sure you have a good idea of where functionality can be extracted or extended to keep the tile from becoming a monster component.

Card flip and match evaluation logic

A card flip refers to flipping a face down card to show it's face; you cannot flip a face up card back over. 

There are only two active flips at a time, many (and eventually all) cards can be face up, but only two can be selected for match evaluation at a time

These restrictions make the logic for flipping and matching a bit more simple. so the logic would go like this:
Is there another card currently selected for match evaluation?
Turn all selected cards face down
Wait for player to flip another card
Notify player that they won the game
Push reference to current card on a "selected" array for match evaluation

note that the title, "matches found/left" and buttons are all in the game control. the only nested component will be the match display
